column4: I'm having trouble using the sliders and buttons on flash video's on youtube, is this a common problem?
yes....its a problem with the 64-bit version
the Adobe-Flashplugin which Ubuntu installs is a 32-bit version ...with a "wrapper" around it ...the wrapper conflicts with compiz.
in effect ...if you temporarily disable compiz (Set Visual Effects to 'None') ...the Flash plugin works fine.
